snippet.title: Kindred Vale - Announcement Trailer for Our New Cozy Game in the Austrian Alps
snippet.description:
We're thrilled to announce Kindred Vale, an enchanting and cozy life simulator set in the mystical heart of the Austrian Alps. Befriend the spirits of the wilds and use their powers to help humans and spirits alike thrive once again. Fly, forage, farm and craft as you discover the heartfelt relationships and colorful stories of a breathtaking world of magic and mystery.

--------------------
Join Our Kindred Vale Discord Server
https://stllv.co/joindiscord

Join our Kickstarter Reservation List
https://kickstart.kindredvalegame.com

Find us here:
Steam / https://store.steampowered.com/app/2782700/Kindred_Vale/
https://twitter.com/stillaliveGames
https://www.instagram.com/stillalivegames/
https://www.tiktok.com/@stillalivegames
Our Website: https://stillalive.games
